Title: Hellbound
Plot: Agent Reyes takes the lead while investigating an X-file case, surrounding a man found skinned alive after having visions of seeing other people appearing skinned alive. Reyes calls on Scully's expertise to help on the investigation, which pays off when Scully finds a link to a case from 1960.
GuestStars: Don Swayze, James McDonnell, Cyril O'Reilly, Katy Boyer, George D. Wallace, Kari Whitman, David Figlioli, Robert Beckwith, James Riker, Travis Riker
